title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Let others in by keeping it real rather than playing it cool today. Your heart may be stormy, but its all too easy to sail forth with only a bright smile to keep people at bay. Perhaps you dont want to trouble your loved ones with your personal problems. But its precisely these times when you feel vulnerable, and even alone, that its wise to reach out for love and support. Dont underestimate your allies when they are eager to help. Henry David Thoreau wrote, True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
